channel.title: The Word of the Lord Endures Forever
channel.description: Study the Bible with the Church, Past and Present. The Word of The Lord Endures Forever is a new podcast from the producers of Issues, Etc. This is a daily, verse-by-verse Bible Study hosted by Pastor Will Weedon., a pastor in the Lutheran Church-Missouri Synod.
channel.itunes:author: Lutheran Public Radio

image.title: The Word of the Lord Endures Forever

channel.rawvoice:donate: Support The Word of the Lord Endures Forever
channel.podcast:funding: Support The Word of the Lord Endures Forever
